message: Documented complete 8-state phase machine with all transitions and guidance. System enforces automatic transitions and blocks manual approval/rejection to prevent orchestrator manipulation.

Phase enforcement is fully automatic and unbypassable. The orchestrator cannot self-approve, self-reject, skip phases, bypass review, or manipulate verdicts. All phase transitions are system-controlled based on agent/reviewer consensus.

automatic_enforcements.reject_phase_review: Always blocked - only reviewers can reject (lines 3735-3746)

data.escape_hatch: Only ESCALATED state allows manual approval with force_escalated=true when all reviewers crash
